buffered_write_stream::buffered_write_stream

Construct, passing the specified argument to initialise the next layer. 

template<
    typename Arg>
buffered_write_stream(
    Arg & a);

template<
    typename Arg>
buffered_write_stream(
    Arg & a,
    std::size_t buffer_size);
